reviewText: I love Dance Moms. It is a great look into the crazy and wacky world of competitive dancing. In every episode, you will see seven girls, who have been dancing since as young as 3-years-old, learn dances in a one week's time and are expected to go out on a competition stage and win. To support these girls are their crazy stage moms, who are there for them all the way and will do anything to get their child ahead. These girls are taught by acclaimed star maker Abby Lee Miller, who has a big heart but has a big bark. You may think this is ludicrous, and it is, but it is all done in an ever so entertaining way. Most of the students at my dance studio watch it, including my dance teacher and we all love it. If you are a dancer and know what it's like to be in the crazy world of competitive dance, then you can relate to this series.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I know I shouldnt but I love this show . One it reminds me of my childhood dancing days , and two Its just pure entertainment.Yes the moms yell and are over the top and ridiculas .. yes abby does the same . BUT its not about that , it IS about the kids . And oh man are these some talented kids. They will have a bright future and Its lovely to see there progression and there dances grow as this show goes on .

reviewText: Great dance show for your young daughters and grandaughters my grand girls love this show it actually insprired my oldest grandaughter to join in a jazz class threw her school after watching miss abbys show and now my six year old wants to join in dance classes in the fall. With this series has you wondering what the moms will do next but i always love to watch maddie cloie and neia brook page and the little diva  makinsie shes such a cutie they are all wonderful dancers you have to watch all seasons to see how the girls mature in the dance indrustry they do such a wonderful job you cant help but fall in love with all the girls i congratulate all the girls for a job well done and look forward to season 3  to be released in time iam hoping that miss abby brings are girls all back together there starting out pretty rocky so far just keep watching.buy the seasons there well worth it ..
Title: N/A

reviewText: I think Season 1 was too forced and Season 3 had too many obvious set ups (confrontations, conflicts, etc) that were thrown in to increase ratings. While it happens in Season 2, I think this is by far the best season of the show so far.To those who are "missing an episode," Lifetime pulled episode 9 due to public opinion that little girls doing a tribute dance to topless showgirls was inappropriate. The episode is still available online if you look hard enough, but Lifetime/Amazon/Netflix/Hulu/DVDs will not include it due to its controversial nature.
Title: N/A
